languages.text: {n}Идира качает головой.{/n} "Никто из офицеров не знал Лорд-капитана по настоящему хорошо. Даже Абеляр, а его она всегда держала ближе остальных. Мне сразу объяснила, что если я буду что-то про нее у {g|Encyclopedia:Warp}варпа{/g} выслушивать без ее санкции — отправлюсь за борт. Я из понятливых, поэтому нос куда не нужно не совала — только по требованию".

traits.locale_text: {n}Идира качает головой.{/n} "Никто из офицеров не знал Лорд-капитана по настоящему хорошо. Даже Абеляр, а его она всегда держала ближе остальных. Мне сразу объяснила, что если я буду что-то про нее у варпа выслушивать без ее санкции — отправлюсь за борт. Я из понятливых, поэтому нос куда не нужно не совала — только по требованию".

languages.text: {n}Idira shakes her head.{/n} "None of the officers knew the Lord Captain well. Not even Abelard, and she was always closer to him than anyone else. She told me from the off if I ever listened to anything in the {g|Encyclopedia:Warp}warp{/g} about her without her permission, I'd be going out through the airlock. I'm not an idiot, so I never stuck my nose where it didn't belong — only when I was asked."
languages.original_text: {n}Идира качает головой.{/n} "Никто из офицеров не знал Лорд-капитана по настоящему хорошо. Даже Абеляр, а его она всегда держала ближе остальных. Я из понятливых, поэтому нос куда не нужно не совала — только по требованию".

She told me from the off that if I ever listened to anything in the {g|Encyclopedia:Warp}warp{/g} about her without her permission, I'd be going out through an airlock. languages.text: {n}伊迪拉摇了摇头。{/n}“没有任何一位军官很了解领主舰长，即便是与她走得很近的阿贝拉德也不例外。她从一开始就和我说得很清楚，如果我在没有得到她允许的情况下，在{g|Encyclopedia:Warp}亚空间{/g}中打听她的事情，她会立刻把我从气闸里丢出去。我可不蠢，我从来不会乱打听我不该打听的东西。只有别人需要我这么做的时候，我才会这么做。”
languages.original_text: {n}Idira shakes her head.{/n} "None of the officers knew the Lord Captain well. Not even Abelard, and she was always closer to him than anyone else. She told me from the off if I ever listened to anything in the {g|Encyclopedia:Warp}warp{/g} about her without her permission, I'd be going out through the airlock. I'm not an idiot, so I never stuck my nose where it didn't belong — only when I was asked."

traits.locale_text: {n}伊迪拉摇了摇头。{/n}“没有任何一位军官很了解领主舰长，即便是与她走得很近的阿贝拉德也不例外。她从一开始就和我说得很清楚，如果我在没有得到她允许的情况下，在{g|Encyclopedia:Warp}亚空间{/g}中打听她的事情，她会立刻把我从气闸里丢出去。我可不蠢，我从来不会乱打听我不该打听的东西。只有别人需要我这么做的时候，我才会这么做。”

languages.original_text: {n}Idira shakes her head.{/n} "None of the officers knew the Lord Captain well. Not even Abelard, and she was always closer to him than anyone else. She told me from the off that if I ever listened to anything in the warp about her without her permission, I'd be going out through an airlock. I'm not an idiot, so I never stuck my nose where it didn't belong — only when I was asked."

languages.text: {n}Idira niega con la cabeza.{/n} «Ninguno de los oficiales conocía bien a la Lord Capitán. Ni siquiera Abelard, y siempre fue más cercana a él que a ninguna otra persona. Me dijo desde el primer momento que, si escuchaba algo en la {g|Encyclopedia:Warp}disformidad{/g} sobre ella sin su permiso, me lanzaría por la esclusa. No soy idiota, así que nunca metí las narices donde no debía. Solo lo hacía cuando me lo pedía».
languages.original_text: {n}Idira shakes her head.{/n} "None of the officers knew the Lord Captain well. Not even Abelard, and she was always closer to him than anyone else. She told me from the off if I ever listened to anything in the {g|Encyclopedia:Warp}warp{/g} about her without her permission, I'd be going out through the airlock. I'm not an idiot, so I never stuck my nose where it didn't belong — only when I was asked."

traits.locale_text: {n}Idira niega con la cabeza.{/n} «Ninguno de los oficiales conocía bien a la Lord Capitán. Ni siquiera Abelard, y siempre fue más cercana a él que a ninguna otra persona. Me dijo desde el primer momento que, si escuchaba algo en la {g|Encyclopedia:Warp}disformidad{/g} sobre ella sin su permiso, me lanzaría por la esclusa. No soy idiota, así que nunca metí las narices donde no debía. Solo lo hacía cuando me lo pedía».

languages.text: {n}イディラは首を横に振る。{/n}「士官たちは誰もロード・キャプテンのことをよく知らなかったわ。アベラルドでさえね。彼女は誰よりもおじちゃんのそばにいたのに。許可なく{g|Encyclopedia:Warp}歪み{/g}で彼女のことを聞き出そうものならエアロックから放り出されることになるって、最初から言われていたわ。あたいはバカじゃないから、自分に関係ないところに首を突っ込むようなことはしなかったわ。頼まれた時以外はね」
languages.original_text: {n}Idira shakes her head.{/n} "None of the officers knew the Lord Captain well. Not even Abelard, and she was always closer to him than anyone else. She told me from the off if I ever listened to anything in the {g|Encyclopedia:Warp}warp{/g} about her without her permission, I'd be going out through the airlock. I'm not an idiot, so I never stuck my nose where it didn't belong — only when I was asked."

traits.locale_text: {n}イディラは首を横に振る。{/n}「士官たちは誰もロード・キャプテンのことをよく知らなかったわ。アベラルドでさえね。彼女は誰よりもおじちゃんのそばにいたのに。許可なく{g|Encyclopedia:Warp}歪み{/g}で彼女のことを聞き出そうものならエアロックから放り出されることになるって、最初から言われていたわ。あたいはバカじゃないから、自分に関係ないところに首を突っ込むようなことはしなかったわ。頼まれた時以外はね」

languages.text: {n}Idira schüttelt den Kopf.{/n} "Niemand von den Offizieren kannte den Lord Captain gut. Nicht einmal Abelard, und sie stand ihm immer näher als jeder andere. Sie sagte mir von Anfang an, wenn ich jemals ohne ihre Erlaubnis etwas im {g|Encyclopedia:Warp}Warp{/g} belauschen sollte, würde sie mich aus der Luftschleuse werfen lassen. Ich bin nicht dumm, also habe ich meine Nase nie irgendwo reingesteckt, wo sie nicht hingehörte ... es sei denn, man bat mich darum."
languages.original_text: {n}Idira shakes her head.{/n} "None of the officers knew the Lord Captain well. Not even Abelard, and she was always closer to him than anyone else. She told me from the off if I ever listened to anything in the {g|Encyclopedia:Warp}warp{/g} about her without her permission, I'd be going out through the airlock. I'm not an idiot, so I never stuck my nose where it didn't belong — only when I was asked."

traits.locale_text: {n}Idira schüttelt den Kopf.{/n} "Niemand von den Offizieren kannte den Lord Captain gut. Nicht einmal Abelard, und sie stand ihm immer näher als jeder andere. Sie sagte mir von Anfang an, wenn ich jemals ohne ihre Erlaubnis etwas im {g|Encyclopedia:Warp}Warp{/g} belauschen sollte, würde sie mich aus der Luftschleuse werfen lassen. Ich bin nicht dumm, also habe ich meine Nase nie irgendwo reingesteckt, wo sie nicht hingehörte ... es sei denn, man bat mich darum."

languages.text: « Aucun des officiers ne la connaissait vraiment, {n}répond Idira en secouant la tête.{/n} Pas même Abélard, et c'était de lui qu'elle était la plus proche. Elle m'a prévenue dès le premier jour que si j'écoutais ce que disait le {g|Encyclopedia:Warp}Warp{/g} à son sujet sans sa permission, elle me balancerait dans l'espace. Je ne suis pas stupide, donc je n'ai jamais fourré mon nez là où il ne fallait pas. Ou uniquement quand elle me le demandait. »
languages.original_text: {n}Idira shakes her head.{/n} "None of the officers knew the Lord Captain well. Not even Abelard, and she was always closer to him than anyone else. She told me from the off if I ever listened to anything in the {g|Encyclopedia:Warp}warp{/g} about her without her permission, I'd be going out through the airlock. I'm not an idiot, so I never stuck my nose where it didn't belong — only when I was asked."

traits.locale_text: « Aucun des officiers ne la connaissait vraiment, {n}répond Idira en secouant la tête.{/n} Pas même Abélard, et c'était de lui qu'elle était la plus proche. Elle m'a prévenue dès le premier jour que si j'écoutais ce que disait le {g|Encyclopedia:Warp}Warp{/g} à son sujet sans sa permission, elle me balancerait dans l'espace. Je ne suis pas stupide, donc je n'ai jamais fourré mon nez là où il ne fallait pas. Ou uniquement quand elle me le demandait. »

languages.text: {n}İdira kafasını sallıyor.{/n} "Subaylardan hiçbiri Lord Kaptan'ı yakından tanımazdı. Hatta her daim en yakınında olan Abelard bile. Lord Kaptan, {g|Encyclopedia:Warp}öteboyutta{/g} kendisi hakkında söylenenleri izni olmadan dinlersem uçsuzu boylayacağımı bana daha en başından söylemişti. Ben de salak değilim, hâliyle haddim olmayan hususlara burnumu sokmadım. Sadece benden istenirse yaptım."
languages.original_text: {n}Idira shakes her head.{/n} "None of the officers knew the Lord Captain well. Not even Abelard, and she was always closer to him than anyone else. She told me from the off if I ever listened to anything in the {g|Encyclopedia:Warp}warp{/g} about her without her permission, I'd be going out through the airlock. I'm not an idiot, so I never stuck my nose where it didn't belong — only when I was asked."

Lord Kaptan, {g|Encyclopedia:Warp}öteboyutta{/g} kendisi hakkında söylenenleri izni olmadan dinlersem uçsuzu boylayacağımı bana daha en başından söylemişti. Ben de salak değilim, hâliyle haddim olmayan hususlara burnumu sokmadım. Sadece benden istenirse yaptım."
